title: Windows Update Errors
description: Fix stuck updates, error codes (0x80...), and failed Windows installations.

steps.title: Run Update Troubleshooter
steps.instruction: Settings → Update & Security → Troubleshoot → Additional troubleshooters → Windows Update → Run the troubleshooter.

steps.title: Reset Update Components
steps.instruction: CMD as Admin → 'net stop wuauserv' and 'net stop bits'. Then rename the SoftwareDistribution folder to clear the cache.

steps.title: Run SFC and DISM
steps.instruction: CMD as Admin → 'sfc /scannow' followed by 'dism /online /cleanup-image /restorehealth'. This fixes corrupt files blocking updates.

steps.title: Check Disk Space
steps.instruction: Ensure you have at least 20GB of free space. Updates often fail silently if the drive is nearly full.

steps.title: Manual Download
steps.instruction: If a specific KB fails, go to the 'Microsoft Update Catalog' website, search for the KB number, and download/install it manually.
